When School Ends, Summer Meals Begin!

For A Meal Near You:
Call 211 or Text*
FOODTX to 877-877

Learn More
  • News
  • Quick Links

Community Development Seeking Applications

The Community Development department is currently soliciting applications for the 2018 Continuum of Care Program Competition.

City of Amarillo Closes for Fourth of July

City of Amarillo offices will close Wednesday, July 4 in observance of Independence Day.

Free Lunches Available During Summer Months

On Wednesday, May 30, free lunch meals to any child under the age of 18 will be provided as part of the 2018 Summer Lunch Program.

City Observes Memorial Day

City of Amarillo offices will close Monday, May 28 in observance of Memorial Day.
More Press Releases

More Events

  • Request for input in presidential search survey

    VHCC students, faculty, staff, administrators, retirees, alumni, College Board members, Foundation Board members, community leaders, and community members are invited to share input.

    Request for input in presidential search survey

  • Songwriting contest seeks original work by April 19

    Songwriters from the region are invited to compete for a $300 cash prize and an opportunity to perform with Nashville’s songwriting greats as part of the 7th annual Richard Leigh Songwriters Festival at Virginia Highlands Community College, Abingdon.

    Songwriting contest seeks original work by April 19
